channel.title: Comments on: Writing reports off third party databases the easy way
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: I think in this case it was an issue with them never hitting a good DBA or other SQL Developer to show the method(s). The developer has actually been one of the best I've had working with me. Has room to gain some cool techniques is all. But we all do in most cases
item.content:encoded: I think in this case it was an issue with them never hitting a good DBA or other SQL Developer to show the method(s). The developer has actually been one of the best I’ve had working with me. Has room to gain some cool techniques is all. But we all do in most cases

item.title: By: Hot stuff
item.dc:creator: Hot stuff
item.description: Dude, get rid of your SQL Developer.
item.content:encoded: Dude, get rid of your SQL Developer.
